Innovative Wrestling Experience (IWE) based out of Tampa, Florida proudly presents it' weekly wrestling show, Collision Course!!!! The show will be held at the American Legion at 3810 W Kennedy Blvd on the intersection of Kennedy Blvd and Dale Mabry Highway. Belltime is 7:30 and tickets are $7 for adults, $3 for kids. Advance purchase tickets are $5 for adults, $2 for kids. For more information or to purchase tickets please contact 813-870-0505. This weeks episode of I.W.E. Collision Course has the following matches, for a great night of hard hitting wrestling action!!!!

The Matches are as follows:


In a rematch from last week, Crow takes on George Martell w/ The Freak Foundation. Last week Crow was defeated in a match to decide if he would join the Freak Foundation and then humiliated in the post match beatdown. Will Crow rise to the occasion and upend Martell and win his acceptance into the Freak Foundation?

"Mr Entertainment" Freako vs Ray Beez w/ Gene Beard. 

Toxic vs Sean Zindell 

Legion" Freaking" Cage w/Gina Marie vs (Me So Good) Nooie Lee
This is definitely one of the matches on the card that will be Match of the Night. These 2 men went tooth to nail last week in trying to score the win on each other. What do these 2 men have in store for each other this week? Come to IWE's Collision Course to find out!!!!

"Raging Bull" Eddie Taurus vs "The Assassin" 
One of the most underrated workers in all of Florida takes on a newcomer to the business. Eddie Taurus is known for a no nonsense- take it to them style of wrestling, as well as some hard hitting. It could be a short night for the Assassin once "Raging Bull" Eddie Taurus gets through with him.

Ice vs "The Ace" Vinny Lee w/ "Merc" Tony Gunnz- Last week we saw "The Ace" take the easy road to the win by cutting a check to "Merc"Tony Gunnz. What is in store this week for either man. Could "Merc" Tony Gunnz be the X factor?

"Latin Sensation" Ricky Romeo vs Jerome Hendrix
Great friends colllide as we anticipate a very good matchup between these 2 competitors. These 2 have a long history of being friends. Could this end at the conclusion of this week's 
show?

And in the Main Event, we have Michael Patrick/Suicide taking on Sideshow/Druid w/The Freak Foundation.
This is a rematch from last weeks show as the Freak Foundation eliminated Michael Patrick from the match to pick up the win on the young Suicide after a Black Hole Slam from Torcher. What does Sideshow and Druid have planned for the opposition? Will Michael Patrick and Suicide overcome the odds stacked against them? 

Check it all out at I.W.E's weekly show, Collision Course!!!! See everyone there!!!!

Ya know, this past weekend we lost one of the best wrestlers, as well as entertainers out there. "Latino Heat" Eddie Guerrero, is gone and I just don't know what to say. Someone I grew up watching all these years, from back in the ECW to WCW to WWE days, is not gonna be around to see get another World Title around his waist. Unbelievable...

I met him twice, and both times he was a very kind and very nice man. Never really got to work with him in practice at Keirns or anything , but talking to him was special. I know that I am gonna miss him, as well as every wrestling fan, casual or hardcore fan, will miss as well. 

I remember watching Eddie vs Malenko and just amazed at how fluid they were in the ring together and just in awe of what they were doing. Same goes for his matches in Japan and against Benoit, Mysterio, Jericho, and countless others. He made everyone look good no matter there ability. I remember when he was out of WWE and was busting his hump to get back to the "BIG SHOW". Seeing him take on Super Crazy at a ROH show was fucking amazing, the man looked like he never missed a beat. His recovery from the abuse, and his eventual Heavyweight Title win, and then him celebrate with Benoit, goes to show ya that good guys do win... 

The wrestling world will never be the same, this will affect us all for years to come in some way, shape or form. Just wish it was a dream and I could wake up from it. Too young to go so soon, saw that he passed of Heart Failure, which is a shame.  I would once again say thank you for being the best out there every time you came through the curtain , and for entertaining me like only you could.  You are in a better place, as much as I hate to say it, I wish you were still here.  My heart is broken, and my prayers go out to you and your family.


God Bless,


R.I.P  Eddie Guerrero




Thanks go the WWE for the moving tribute on Raw, I cried like I haven't cried in a long time. I feel like I lost a brother in this sport of ours..

Ok so I said I would update about some of the shit thats been going on so here we go.. Keep your tray tables up and seatbelts locked at all times!!!!

So Oct 4th I left for Portland, Maine. My ex girlfriend who I went out with and stayed in contact with for over 5 yrs lives there and we have been talking more seriously lately about our futures together. I decided I was gonna visit and see how things would go and go from there...

I left Tampa about 6:30, flew into Washington Dulles Airport, which if you haven't flown into it, it's an absolute clusterfuck...Get off plane and check to see what gate I am on, and the FUCKING FLIGHT IS CANCELLED!!!!(due to weather, fog!!). I am fucking going nuts, go to the customer service desk and they inform me that there are no more flights that night, or the next , and I would be in Washington till Thur!

That shit wasn't gonna work as I HAD to be in Portland so Laura could pick me up. So they said I could catch a flight to Manchester, NH  which is about 3 hrs from Laura. So I call her, she says she will be there(awesome woman I tell ya!) and I proceed to the gate. I arrive at the gate with time to spare and wait.. and wait.. plane was supposed to leave at 9:20, I was at the gate at 9:10 and they were boarding for Philadelphia! I asked the Missy Elliott double if the flight for New Hampshire had boarded. She stated it left 25 minutes ago!!!! HOLY FUCK I AM PISSED!!!!!!

I proceed to haul ass back to the the cust service desk and notice that 2 security guards weighing about 150 lbs are following me.. I get to the desk and the lady has the nerve to ask what is wrong! I tell her ever so nicely, "YOU BOOKED ME ON A FUCKING PLANE THAT LEFT BEFORE I GOT TO THE GATE! AM I SUPPOSED TO CHASE IT DOWN THE RUNWAY?" The lady looks at me like I am crazy and the security guards ask if there is a problem, and I respond back with"If I don't get a flight out of this shithole and get as close to Portland Maine, tonite, then we will have a problem." Security guard looks at me crazy and I respond back" And it's gonna take more than you 2 guys to do anything about it either, so you better get a bigger guy or more of ya!" I WAS FUCKING PISSED AND don't have the greatest temper.( I ain't as big as Bruce Steele,Erick Stevens or Madison,  but I sure as hell ain't no Suicide or Heater, and have a decent size  can hold my own!)She then tells me the only other thing is flying into Boston... Never been there, I call Laura and she says that she will Mapquest directions and she will be there but will take 4-5 hrs to get there.. I was like, ok just be careful driving.

I make it to the gate and board the flight finally, but pissed cuz of all the bullshit I have gone through this evening... Finally get to Boston, and I hate it. No Mets Fan should be subject to being in Boston for any amount of time... So I get in about 11:00 and sit and wait.... and wait.. and wait.. and then Laura gets to the airport at 1:00 am... and finally see her, and it is sooooo good.. I can't explain..  We hug, smooch , all that lovey dovey happy couple stuff and haul ass... 

Needless to say it was like 1 when we left, and with the fog, and the fact that my girl needs glasses to drive at night, and trying to remember the way back, we finally made it home at about 6 am. And yes, I did not fall asleep once in the car on the way back.. Anyone that has gone on road trips with me knows I tend to fall asleep on the way back.. But was wide awake... After all I hadn't seen my beautiful girl in forever...  So get to bed at 6 am and she has to get up 40 minutes later.. Poor girl.... but we were together again , and will be together again very soon..

Oh yeah, and to add insult to injury, my luggage got more flying miles than I did, then sent it to Boston, then to Portland, then back to Boston, then to Portland again, then once again to Boston before they realized that it was supposed to be in Portland in the first place!!! What a bunch of dumb motherfuckers!!!! Finally got my luggage Fri afternoon at like 4....
